Trump vs Ivy League: Funding disputes, settlements, and battles explained
description: In President Trump’s second term, federal scrutiny of the Ivy League intensified, freezing billions in funding. Penn, Columbia, and Brown settled by revising policies and making payments, while Harvard is fighting in court over $2.2 billion in cuts. Cornell and Princeton remain undecided, with Dartmouth and Yale largely spared. The disputes highlight tensions between federal authority and university autonomy.

title: Quake shakes Assam: Nurses act swiftly as tremors rock ward
description: During a 5.8-magnitude earthquake in Assam, nurses in Nagaon bravely protected newborns, earning praise for their quick thinking. The earthquake, with its epicenter in Udalguri, caused tremors across the Northeast and parts of West Bengal, prompting widespread panic. While no major damage or casualties were reported, authorities are closely monitoring the situation in the high seismic zone.

Authorities are cracking down on these illegal activities, urging the public to verify land ownership before investing to avoid being conned.

He vowed to prosecute the killer to the fullest extent of the law and promised a tougher stance on illegal immigrant criminals if he were in power.

Users are transforming selfies into 90s Bollywood-style portraits using Google’s Gemini Nano Banana image editing tool. The AI crafts images with chiffon sarees, grainy textures, and golden-hour lighting, mimicking classic Bollywood aesthetics with popular styles like polka-dot and floral sarees.
